programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster discovers that everyone else has a kind of collection and decides she needs one too.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree and then look after them for the day.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: When Bob and his team are fitting a lift into a Spring City skyscraper, Scoop decides that he would like to see the view from the top.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: The annual Pontypandy Cheese Roll Challenge takes place, but Norman Price diverts the path of the cheese to the edge of a cliff and finds himself in big trouble.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Everyone wants to know about new engine Geoffrey, who Thomas invented to take the blame for an accident.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive monkey meets a beekeeper and discovers why the insects are so busy.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: The twin genies-in-training discover a magical gem that makes two of everything - including Zeta.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Popping Balloons.
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are each given a colourful balloon at the end of Smartysaurus's party, but when a number of balloons start bursting, Noddy tries to find out why.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: The pups plan a special celebration for Wally the Walrus, but when he doesn't show up, they find that he has a special new friend named Walinda.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: The fairies wake up to find their wands are not working, forcing the kingdom to go without the help of magic for a day.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: All of his friends have won the Great Soapbox Race before, but Digby has only ever come second and this year he is determined to win - but so is Grizel.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The children take a trip to a Dinosaur Park to celebrate Freddy Fox's birthday.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story, but it is not long before the pair are awake again.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: A mummy pig's piglets cannot cover themselves in mud because their waterhole has dried up.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: The little girl rabbit plays out in the rain with the sheep, the ducks and her best friend Alien, who uses magic to make Wanda a necklace from raindrops.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Journalist and broadcaster Matthew Wright is joined by a panel of guests and the studio audience to debate the issues of the day.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: The doctors meet a patient suffering from high blood pressure caused by stress, and set him on a course of action that should allow him to reclaim his life. Meanwhile, Dr Ward treats Ned, a man suffering from persistent pins and needles in his hands, and a young lady concerned about unwanted hair on her chin.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Phoebe seeks solace in alcohol, VJ questions his parenting ability after seeing Luc with Irene, and Olivia has reservations when Hunter suggests they move in together.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: The Lassiter's Bonza Barbie Bash leads to Amy react badly after seeing Leo with someone else and David attempt to hook up with one of the backpackers.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: A hero of ancient Greece vows to save a princess from being sacrificed to a ferocious sea monster. However, to defeat the creature he must first embark on a journey into the underworld and seize the head of the monstrous Medusa, whose gaze turns men to stone. Mythical adventure, starring Harry Hamlin, Laurence Olivier, Maggie Smith and Judi Bowker, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen. Edited for violence and nudity.(n)

programme.title: Jason and the Argonauts
programme.desc: The son of an overthrown king must embark on an epic sea voyage in search of the fabled Golden Fleece so he can return and reclaim his kingdom. Before he can seize the treasure, he has to overcome a series of horrific creatures, including a seven-headed monster and a horde of sword-wielding skeletons. Mythological fantasy adventure, starring Todd Armstrong, Honor Blackman, Nancy Kovack, Niall MacGinnis and Patrick Troughton, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen. Includes 5 News Update at 4.20pm.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: The Lassiter's Bonza Barbie Bash leads to Amy react badly after seeing Leo with someone else and David attempt to hook up with one of the backpackers.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Phoebe seeks solace in alcohol, VJ questions his parenting ability after seeing Luc with Irene, and Olivia has reservations when Hunter suggests they move in together.(n)

programme.title: FIA World Rally Championship Highlights
programme.desc: The Rally Argentina. Highlights of the fifth round of the season, which took place in the lakeside resort of Villa Carlos Paz in the province of Cordoba. Reigning champion Sebastien Ogier came into this event at the top of the standings, and held a 13-point lead over his nearest rival Jari-Matti Latvala.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Tim and Tom team up with Merseyside police to carry out a raid on a house in Liverpool, Jim wrestles with an aggressive driver, and officers armed with Tasers respond to an alleged assault with a meat cleaver. Plus, Dicko is called upon when a young man is stabbed in a street brawl.(n)

programme.title: The Story of
programme.desc: Profile of the comedian, examining her early years performing at the Edinburgh Festival in the 1990s, inspired by her hero Eric Morecambe. Her act led to supporting roles in Smack the Pony, Absolutely Fabulous and Not Going Out, before reaching stardom with writing and starring in her successful sitcom and a dramatic role in Call the Midwife.(n)

programme.title: Most Shocking Celebrity Moments
programme.sub-title: The Most Shocking Celebrity Moments of 2016.
programme.desc: Louis Walsh, Michelle Visage, Darren Day, Bobby Norris, Chloe Khan, Eamonn Holmes, Kerry Katona, Stefan Dennis and Len Goodman recall the year's showbiz events. Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie split, while the curious coupling of Liam Payne and Cheryl occurred. Meanwhile, Justin Bieber was mean to his fans, Kanye West reignited his long-running feud with Taylor Swift, and Zayn Malik revealed the real reason for leaving One Direction. Shockingly good moments included politician Ed Balls on Strictly and Honey G on The X Factor, while the restart of Top Gear failed to fire on all cylinders.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Body of Proof
programme.desc: In the last-ever episode of the crime drama, Megan finally receives permission to exhume her father's body - but the coffin is empty. She discovers a file in his office relating to a girl who was killed the day before he died, and her investigation leads her to believe she was murdered by a serving police officer who tried to replicate the methods of a convicted serial killer. Dana Delany stars.(n)

programme.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink
programme.desc: Documentary following a tattoo parlour catering to British tourists on Greece's Kavos strip. A new artist joins the team, and a customer gets a Chinese symbol on her arm - only to realise afterwards that she has no idea what it means. Two friends make a visit to the tattoo parlour part of a drinking game, and a woman gets a tattoo of a map of Corfu, only to find Kavos has been drawn in the wrong place.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Ann Maurice offers advice to a divorcing couple trying to sell their three-bedroom Victorian semi in Camberley, Surrey. The main problems are smelly furniture, unfinished DIY jobs and a caravan blocking the driveway, so the team gives the place a lick of paint and a clean.(n)

programme.title: Great Scientists
programme.desc: Allan Chapman profiles Greek philosopher Aristotle, whose writings defined the future course of scientific inquiry by framing the natural world as a unified whole governed by certain laws.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of dedicated volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Lily discovers an old compass washed up on the beach. It comes in very handy when Bull seems to be in trouble up on the Great North Cliff, and Hatsie and Lily race to his rescue.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.sub-title: A Simple Sunshine Can Make You Happy.
programme.desc: The rabbit looks for her friends so that she can play, but they are all busy doing other things.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family head to the pond to play with their toys.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The little girl swaps places with her mum, but finds being Queen is not easy.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Alex works toward getting his Action Scouts fire safety badge, so Marshall and the Paw Patrol go camping with him and Mr Porter to show him how to make and extinguish a camp fire.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team finishes building a new milkshake bar, and the job inspires Scoop to experiment with ingredients for concrete.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman decides to stage his own magic show. With the fire marshal in town for a special inspection, it remains to be seen whether all will go according to plan.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: When Toby tries to attract attention after running out of coal at the scrapyard, the other engines think that he is being scrapped.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The puppet joins some of his friends for some flowery fun as they learn how to bake bread. Children's fun with the monkey, who sets out to learn everything about the world.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: Zeta steals the girls' magical gem in order to enchant some cleaning supplies, which go on to cause chaos.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Pink Lettuces.
programme.desc: When Smartysaurus reveals that she had a special request for pink paint, the Ninjas admit to turning the lettuces into pom-poms to cheer on Pink Ninja in her marathon attempt.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Cap'n Turbot finds a giant dinosaur bone, but a landslide leaves him trapped on a small cliff ledge.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: Grizel finds a way to disguise herself as Digby, and enjoys tormenting his friends. They cannot understand why he is behaving so badly.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a drain.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George's favourite toy Mr Dinosaur breaks, so he goes to Mr Fox's shop to get a replacement and spots Dino Roar - which has a host of new features.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Gertie the giraffe needs help bending down to take a drink, so Wissper enlists the help of Peggy the penguin to raise the water level.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: When Alien becomes unwell, he does some strange things because the illness affects his magic.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Dr Mio Kwan examines a nine-year-old girl who has a small lump in her chest and Dr Jackie Bulger prescribes a course of antibiotics for a boy struggling to pass water. Nithy Nanda helps a young woman whose various conditions have left her reeling from the side effects of countless drugs, while Dr Jas Deooray treats young baby Arneev, who is having difficulty breathing.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In West London, agents Max and Cona chase up more than £2,000 in unpaid parking fines, but when they try to seize a vehicle, the debtor ties it to a tree. Meanwhile in Lancashire, officers Stewart and Elmor try to collect £4,000 owed for unpaid nursery fees, and in Bedfordshire two agents must tackle a church ministry that owes over £8,000 in rent arrears.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Brody has advice for both Phoebe and Justin, while Irene realises VJ and Leah are struggling with Luc and makes a generous offer. Olivia and Hunter struggle to find a place to live.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: An accident at the Backpackers lands David in trouble and in need of help. After arriving home from a night shift, Steph suspects that Sonya has succumbed to temptation.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a Navy intelligence officer, and the choice of murder weapon leads the agents to believe he was killed by a colleague. However, while former Seal Sam threatens to compromise the integrity of the case, evidence suggests the victim may have been selling secrets to the enemy.(n)

programme.title: Brace for Impact
programme.desc: Premiere. When the brother of disgraced flight crash investigator Sofia Gilchrist dies in a plane she was supposed to be on, Sofia breaks protocol and secretly looks into the disaster. Thriller, starring Kerry Condon, Sheila McCarthy and Ennis Esmer.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: An accident at the Backpackers lands David in trouble and in need of help. After arriving home from a night shift, Steph suspects that Sonya has succumbed to temptation.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Brody has advice for both Phoebe and Justin, while Irene realises VJ and Leah are struggling with Luc and makes a generous offer. Olivia and Hunter struggle to find a place to live.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Tim and Tom team up with Merseyside police to carry out a raid on a house in Liverpool, Jim wrestles with an aggressive driver, and officers armed with Tasers respond to an alleged assault with a meat cleaver. Plus, Dicko is called upon when a young man is stabbed in a street brawl.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: A farmer brings in one of his much-loved semi-feral cats for treatment, with tricky surgery required to remove the lump on his face that could be a life-threatening tumour. Meanwhile, Julian helps prized ewe Vera to give birth, while Peter and Sarah encounter Alfie, a cocky young donkey who has unusual parenting issues.(n)

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: Premiere. An ex cop working as an unlicensed private eye is hired by a drug trafficker to find the men who murdered his wife. As the detective investigates the case, he discovers the men he is tracking have killed many times before and takes desperate measures to stop them claiming another victim. Crime thriller based on Lawrence Block's novel, starring Liam Neeson and Dan Stevens. Includes 5 News Update at 10.00pm.(n)

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: FBI agent Frank Castle enrages a powerful gangland kingpin when a gunfight accidentally causes the death of the mobster's son. The crime boss retaliates by wiping out Castle's entire family, but the lawman reinvents himself as a vigilante, acting as judge, jury and executioner to the underworld. Thriller based on the Marvel comic-book anti-hero, starring Thomas Jane, John Travolta, Will Patton, Rebecca Romijn and Roy Scheider.(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: In this collection of crime tales set in the underbelly of a miserable metropolis, a bruiser seeks the person who killed his one-night stand. Elsewhere, a cop is framed for a series of murders, and a group of prostitutes must dispose of a dead body(n)

programme.title: Felices 140
programme.desc: A woman reveals to her nearest and dearest she has won the lottery at her lavish 40th birthday party. Instead of celebrating with her, the guests begin to plot against her(n)

programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
programme.desc: On Thursday nights three female friends -- Alex, Sukie, and Jane -- meet to chug martinis, learn Chinese aphrodisiac cooking and lament the scarcity of eligible men. As they sit around, they fantasize about and describe their idea of the ideal male. Arriving in town the following day is Satan, disguised as mysterious stranger Darrell Van Horn. One by one, Van Horne seduces each of the women. Then, strange things begin to happen(n)

programme.title: Eraser
programme.desc: Arnold Schwarzenegger plays U.S. Marshal John "The Eraser" Kruger, the top gun in the US Marshall Witness Protection scheme; he erases their past and deals with their future. His latest assignment is whistleblower Dr. Lee Cullen, who has evidence against a major arms corporation that's selling weapons to terrorists with the collusion of rogue enemy agents within. But there is danger nearer home for Kruger, within his own department, and not only must he protect Cullen but find the traitor before he's the target. Chuck Russell's all-action film sees Arnie at his rough, tough best as the hero short on words but long on action(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, the rebel learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect the King's throne. The outlaw counts upon the support of his band of followers, including his Moorish companion, a drunken priest and the beautiful Maid Marian(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Biopic of Ernie Davis, who overcame prejudice to become the first black athlete to win the highest honour in college football(n)

programme.title: Pride and Glory
programme.desc: A detective's probe into the murder of four cops points to corruption and his own brother and brother-in-law, both of whom are cops(n)

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: Steven Soderbergh's remake of the classic Andrei Torkovsky film stars George Clooney as the therapist sent to mentor a group of astronauts on the Prometheus space station, where the remaining crew are both locked in their own fears, speaking of visions of lost loved ones. At first sceptical, when Clooney's lost wife appears to him, he begins to wonder what influence the mysterious planet Solaris has on the human psyche(n)

programme.title: By the Sea
programme.desc: In this intense romantic drama set in 1970s France, a former dancer and her writer husband attempt to revive their marriage by taking a cross-country journey to a small coastal town, where they bond with its quirky inhabitants(n)

programme.title: Swept Away
programme.desc: Comedy in which a millionaire and his spoilt and arrogant wife charter a yacht to take them and a group of friends from Greece to Italy. When she is unimpressed with her journey, the millionaire's wife takes her anger out on the crew, but the tables are turned when she is stranded on a desert island with one of the sailors(n)

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: A stranger steps in to save a pregnant woman from hitman Hertz. He delivers her baby and takes off, pursued by the killer and his henchmen. Supercharged actioner(n)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: A riotous and raunchy exploration of the passage to adulthood as Jim and his friends experience life, love and libido..(n)

programme.title: The Hand that Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: Peyton was once a happily married woman, but when her doctor husband is accused of assaulting a patient and he commits suicide, her world falls apart and she plots revenge. Claire, the woman who made the accusation, hires Peyton as a nanny, not knowing of their past involvement. Peyton then proceeds to terrorize the family, attempts to seduce the husband and generally destroy Claire as she feels she has been destroyed(n)

programme.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: Small-town teen Darren falls in with a traveling freak show after being transformed into a vampire by the ringmaster. As Darren makes friends with the freaks, he discovers that the vampires are involved in a war with their rivals and that the supernatural underworld is about to explode(n)

programme.title: Head of State
programme.desc: Can a high-attitude African-American politician who says what he thinks stand a chance in a presidential campaign? Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock) is a straight-talking alderman representing a inner-city neighborhood in Washington, D.C. In the midst of a hard-fought race for the White House, the Democratic presidential and vice-presidential candidates are killed in an airline crash, and with little time to prepare a new campaign, the Republican candidate, Vice President Brian Lewis (Nick Searcy), seems all but guaranteed to win. With practically nothing to loose, party head Martin Geller (Dylan Baker) approaches Gilliam and asks him to stand as the Democrat's presidential candidate. While Gilliam is dubious at first, before long his streetwise style and willingness to face the issues head-on earns him surprising figures in the polls, especially after he persuades his short-fused older brother, Mitch Gilliam (Bernie Mac), to join the ticket as vice presidential candidate -- a big jump for a bail bondsman. Gilliam's love life also becomes more complicated as his ex-girlfriend Kim (Robin Givens) decides she wants him back now that he has a shot at the White House, even though Gilliam only has eyes for Lisa (Tamala Jones). Head of State marked the directorial debut for comic and actor Chris Rock, who also co-wrote and co-produced the film(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: Ron Howard helms this adaptation of Nathaniel Philbrick's historical novel about the harrowing high-seas encounter that inspired Herman Melville's Moby Dick. In the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship the Essex struggle to survive after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days. Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy, Ben Whishaw, and Brendan Gleeson co-star(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: The true story of one of America's most violent and infamous gangsters, Whitey Bulger. Johnny Depp stars as Bulger, who was the brother of a state senator and was eventually convinced to wear a wire for the FBI to bring down the Italian mafia in Boston after they invaded his territory. Scott Cooper directs, with Mark Mallouk penning the screenplay based on Dick Lehr and Gerald O'Neill's 2001 best-seller Black Mass: The True Story of An Unholy Alliance Between The FBI and The Irish Mob(n)

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind retired military officer spends a fateful weekend in New York in the company of a prep-school student who was hired to take care of him(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: A parody of the much-done medieval English tale of Robin Hood and his Merry Men. English hearthrob Cary Elwes gets a turn in the role of the hero of Sherwood Forest who robs from the rich to give to the poor when he returns from the Crusades to find his beloved King Richard usurped by the evil Prince John and his henchman, the Sheriff of Rottingham(n)

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Smalltown chump Adam Sandler inherits a fortune (plus sneaky butler John Turturro). But his wealth draws gold-diggers and tricky reporter Winona Ryder(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: Return to the decade that taste forgot as Adam Sandler stars in this surprise smash comedy set amid the big hair, pastel shirts and relentlessly peppy pop of the 1980s. When one-time rock hopeful Robbie is jilted at the altar, he vents his bitterness in song, even when singing at other people's weddings! Only true love can redeem the broken hearted songster but fortunately, he's about to meet a woman who will spin him right round (like a record)(n)

programme.title: The Wash
programme.desc: Sean is financially strapped and on the verge of losing his home and his car until his roommate Dee Loc suggests he joins him as an employee at the local car wash. Tension mounts between the pals when the establishment's eccentric owner Mr. Washington promotes the more mature and responsible Sean over Dee Loc. However, when their boss is kidnapped, Sean and Dee Loc must work together to save their employer, their jobs, and their friendship(n)

programme.title: La isla mínima
programme.desc: Two polar opposite detectives must work together to stop a ruthless serial killer who preys on teenage girls(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Tight-knit gang of street racers battle a new nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists(n)

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: Based upon Mark Millar's explosive graphic novel series and helmed by stunning visualist director Timur Bekmambetov, Wanted stars Academy Award-winners Angelina Jolie and Morgan Freeman as members of a secret fraternity of assassins. James McAvoy portrays a slacker who is unexpectedly recruited to join the ranks of these elite fighters. As his powers and skills increase under their tutelage, however, he begins to waver between heroism and vengeance, and discovers that there is more to his dangerous associates than meets the eye. Starring Angelina Jolie, Morgan Freeman & James McAvoy(n)

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City

As Darren makes friends with the freaks, he discovers that the vampires are involved in a war with their rivals and that the supernatural underworld is about to explode(n)

programme.title: Head of State
programme.desc: Can a high-attitude African-American politician who says what he thinks stand a chance in a presidential campaign? Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock) is a straight-talking alderman representing a inner-city neighborhood in Washington, D.C. In the midst of a hard-fought race for the White House, the Democratic presidential and vice-presidential candidates are killed in an airline crash, and with little time to prepare a new campaign, the Republican candidate, Vice President Brian Lewis (Nick Searcy), seems all but guaranteed to win. With practically nothing to loose, party head Martin Geller (Dylan Baker) approaches Gilliam and asks him to stand as the Democrat's presidential candidate. While Gilliam is dubious at first, before long his streetwise style and willingness to face the issues head-on earns him surprising figures in the polls, especially after he persuades his short-fused older brother, Mitch Gilliam (Bernie Mac), to join the ticket as vice presidential candidate -- a big jump for a bail bondsman. Gilliam's love life also becomes more complicated as his ex-girlfriend Kim (Robin Givens) decides she wants him back now that he has a shot at the White House, even though Gilliam only has eyes for Lisa (Tamala Jones). Head of State marked the directorial debut for comic and actor Chris Rock, who also co-wrote and co-produced the film(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past(n)

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: Ron Howard helms this adaptation of Nathaniel Philbrick's historical novel about the harrowing high-seas encounter that inspired Herman Melville's Moby Dick. In the winter of 1820, the crew of the New England whaling ship the Essex struggle to survive after an attack by a rogue sperm whale leaves them stranded at sea for 90 days. Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy, Ben Whishaw, and Brendan Gleeson co-star(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: The true story of one of America's most violent and infamous gangsters, Whitey Bulger. Johnny Depp stars as Bulger, who was the brother of a state senator and was eventually convinced to wear a wire for the FBI to bring down the Italian mafia in Boston after they invaded his territory. Scott Cooper directs, with Mark Mallouk penning the screenplay based on Dick Lehr and Gerald O'Neill's 2001 best-seller Black Mass: The True Story of An Unholy Alliance Between The FBI and The Irish Mob(n)

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind retired military officer spends a fateful weekend in New York in the company of a prep-school student who was hired to take care of him(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
programme.desc: A parody of the much-done medieval English tale of Robin Hood and his Merry Men. English hearthrob Cary Elwes gets a turn in the role of the hero of Sherwood Forest who robs from the rich to give to the poor when he returns from the Crusades to find his beloved King Richard usurped by the evil Prince John and his henchman, the Sheriff of Rottingham(n)

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Smalltown chump Adam Sandler inherits a fortune (plus sneaky butler John Turturro). But his wealth draws gold-diggers and tricky reporter Winona Ryder(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: Return to the decade that taste forgot as Adam Sandler stars in this surprise smash comedy set amid the big hair, pastel shirts and relentlessly peppy pop of the 1980s. When one-time rock hopeful Robbie is jilted at the altar, he vents his bitterness in song, even when singing at other people's weddings! Only true love can redeem the broken hearted songster but fortunately, he's about to meet a woman who will spin him right round (like a record)(n)

programme.title: The Wash
programme.desc: Sean is financially strapped and on the verge of losing his home and his car until his roommate Dee Loc suggests he joins him as an employee at the local car wash. Tension mounts between the pals when the establishment's eccentric owner Mr. Washington promotes the more mature and responsible Sean over Dee Loc. However, when their boss is kidnapped, Sean and Dee Loc must work together to save their employer, their jobs, and their friendship(n)

A rally car goes head to head with a bobsleigh, and comedian Eddie Izzard is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.(n)

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Coverage of the 2013 downhill race from London, as the competitors unleash their four-wheeled, motor-less creations on a course littered with obstacles.(n)

programme.title: Arnie's Greatest Ever Stunts
programme.desc: Actor and former Governor of California Arnold Schwarzenegger presents a countdown of the most spectacular stunts ever committed to film. The Terminator star famously insisted on performing many of his own stunts during his Hollywood action-man heyday, and here, he highlights the achievements of fellow stars whose efforts produced thrilling set-pieces on-screen. However, Arnie does not limit himself to high-octane antics from the silver screen. He also showcases stand-alone feats, such as Jean Claude Van Damme's daring splits manoeuvre between two moving trucks, and Felix Baumgartner's free fall to Earth from the stratosphere. Includes commentary from fans, comedians, stunt coordinators and the daredevils themselves.(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Heroes
programme.desc: A rebellious American soldier fighting in occupied France learns from a captive German officer the whereabouts of a fortune in Nazi gold. Recruiting the aid of three fellow soldiers, he puts together a daring plan to penetrate enemy lines to get their hands on the bullion. Second World War adventure, starring Clint Eastwood, Telly Savalas, Donald Sutherland, Don Rickles and Harry Dean Stanton.(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Presenters Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are challenged to build a bridge over the River Kwai in Thailand. In order to do that, however, they have to drive across Burma, a country that has been largely closed to Westerners for more than 40 years, and must make the trip in three lorries, each bought sight unseen from the internet on a limited budget. What follows is an epic journey of beautiful scenery, regular adversity, ongoing malfunction and the constant bickering of the three men.(n)

Mrs Bennet sizes up George Wickham as a potential suitor for her daughter - but he has set his heart on society heiress Miss King.(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Rejected by Elizabeth, Darcy decides to return to Rosling Park - and resolves to reveal the truth about Wickham's character in a letter. Colin Firth, Jennifer Ehle, Alison Steadman, Benjamin Whitrow and Julia Sawalha star.(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Despite Miss Bingley's efforts to keep them apart, Darcy and Elizabeth's relationship grows more affectionate - until bad news arrives from Longbourn about Lydia and Wickham. Jane Austen adaptation, starring Jennifer Ehle, Colin Firth and Julia Sawalha.(n)

programme.title: Pride and Prejudice
programme.desc: Wickham's elopement with Lydia makes Elizabeth see him for what he really is, while Bingley proposes to Jane - an offer she readily accepts. Colin Firth and Jennifer Ehle star.(n)

programme.title: Death Comes to Pemberley
programme.desc: Anna Maxwell Martin, Matthew Rhys and Jenna Coleman star in this sequel to Pride and Prejudice, adapted from the best-selling novel by PD James, which brings Jane Austen's world back to life in a highly original way - with a murder mystery plot at its centre. The drama picks up six years on from the marriage of Elizabeth and Darcy, as the couple prepare for the lavish annual ball at their magnificent Pemberley home. However, the unannounced arrival of Elizabeth's wayward sister Lydia brings the event to an abrupt halt when she stumbles in screaming that her husband, Wickham, has been murdered. Darcy leads a search party out to the woodlands and finds a blood-soaked corpse - but it's not the body they were expecting to find. Trevor Eve, Rebecca Front, James Fleet and Matthew Goode co-star.(n)

programme.title: Death Comes to Pemberley
programme.desc: Wickham's arrest leads to the cancellation of the ball, and Jane arrives to help quell Lydia and Mrs Bennet's hysterics. Darcy gradually begins to retreat into a version of his younger self, a change that threatens his marriage, and Elizabeth grows concerned after her husband declares that his sister Georgiana must marry for duty, while there are disturbing revelations about, and by, Louisa Bidwell. Anna Maxwell Martin and Matthew Rhys star in this sequel to Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice, adapted from the best-selling novel by PD James.(n)

programme.title: Death Comes to Pemberley
programme.desc: Elizabeth remains aggrieved at Darcy's treatment of Georgiana, but her immediate concern is for her sister Lydia, whose husband's indiscretions and secrets look likely to come to light during his trial for the murder of Captain Denny. As the court case progresses, Darcy realises his preoccupation with Pemberley has served to distance himself from both his wife and his sister, and he reaches out to the pair of them. The trial draws to a close, and Wickham's fate remains in the balance - until a last-minute turn of events promises to save him from the hangman's noose. Anna Maxwell Martin and Matthew Rhys star in this sequel to Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice, adapted from the best-selling novel by PD James.(n)

programme.title: The Red Tent
programme.desc: Drama, based on Anita Diamant's bestselling novel, about the 12 tribes of Israel, as told through the eyes of Jacob's only daughter Dinah. In the opening episode, Dinah learns how her father acquired Laban's four daughters as his brides - Leah, Rachel, Bilhah and Zilpah. Minnie Driver, Morena Baccarin and Rebecca Ferguson star.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Alleyn Mysteries
programme.desc: Angry artist Agatha Troy is determined to unmask the forger who is faking her paintings. Inspector Alleyn finds time to alert her to the possible danger involved in her search, but has to concentrate his detecting energies on the case of a corpse found in a tranquil spot outside the home of Percival Pyke Period. A fractious party of lunch guests provides the necessary pool of suspects. With guest stars John Gielgud, Geoffrey Palmer and Belinda Lang.(n)

programme.title: New Tricks
programme.desc: A dog is found killed in a manner that matches a series of animal slayings from 30 years earlier. The team reopens the case, but the cruelty of the crimes affects Brian's judgement - especially when his own pet dies. Jack's deteriorating health causes concern for his colleagues and a visit to a museum leads to an alarming discovery. Richard Briers guest stars.(n)

programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez and Ralph Fiennes star in this romcom, director Wayne Wang's modern-day take on the Cinderella folk tale. programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Big Moments: The Romance Resonance.
programme.desc: Sheldon stumbles upon a major scientific breakthrough, causing him to feel like a fraud, while Penny steps up her game with Leonard after seeing Howard make a romantic gesture to Bernadette. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Big Moments: The Gorilla Dissolution.
programme.desc: Penny gets fired from the movie, prompting her to take a serious look at her life. Raj receives advice from Sheldon after he sees Emily on a date with another man at the cinema, while Howard's mother breaks her leg. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Big Moments: The Matrimonial Momentum.
programme.desc: Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another woman when he was away on his North Sea research expedition. After driving all the way to Las Vegas, she must now decide whether she wants to go through with the wedding. Back home, Sheldon doesn't know how to act after Amy tells him she wants them to take a relationship break.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Big Moments: The Opening Night Excitation.
programme.desc: After more than five years of dating, Sheldon and Amy spend their first night together, while Leonard, Howard and Raj must decide who will take their extra Star Wars movie ticket. Plus, Sheldon's Obi-Wan advises him on his difficult relationship decisions. Starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with recurring guest star Bob Newhart.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Big Moments: The Valentino Submergence.
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy host a Valentine's Day episode of Fun with Flags, while Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette discover a surprise in their hot tub, and Raj is torn between Emily and a girl he met at the Comic Bookstore. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Big Moments: The Positive Negative Reaction.
programme.desc: When Bernadette shares some news, the groups' reactions are not what she expected, with Wolowitz freaking out about her announcement. Comedy, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: Big Moments: The Celebration Experimentation.
programme.desc: In the 200th episode of the comedy, the gang finally celebrates Sheldon's birthday after more than nine years together, with the help of a few special guests. Starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco, with guest appearances from Adam West, Wil Wheaton and Stephen Hawking.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Scott is heartbroken by cancelled plans, and Mercedes discovers Ryan's secret stash. Meanwhile, Kim is caught out by Oscar, Louis rethinks Simone's request and Sally gets a shock.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben takes Riley away for a hike in the woods to give her a break from an overprotective Danny, while Bonnie and Tucker search for evidence that may get Brad released from jail.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is bothered by the attention he receives in the wake of his heavy element discovery, but is taken aback when his work is disproved by Leonard. Meanwhile, Raj makes Howard and Bernadette feel inadequate when he stays with them for a week and is the perfect house guest.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon leaves for Texas when his sister goes into labour. While he is away, the rest of the friends decorate for Christmas and reflect on how much he has changed their lives. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Harry plans a raucous country party, where he intends to charm Ella behind Julius's back, while Fredrik hears about Olivia's recent dalliances and asks Mimi out on a date.(n)

programme.title: Empire
programme.desc: Unexpected news from Cookie makes Lucious uneasy about the future and Giuliana persuades him to comply with her plans. Anika and Tariq come up with a new scheme.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Penny agree to participate in an unusual experiment, and Leonard, Amy, Raj and Emily spend the evening trying to escape from a `zombie'. Elsewhere, Howard and Bernadette run into trouble at the airport after returning from Mrs Wolowitz's funeral. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Trouble arises when Amy learns that Sheldon has applied for a one-way mission to colonise Mars. Meanwhile, Leonard surprises Penny with a gift, and Raj decides to snoop around Emily's flat after she is called back to work during their evening together. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Transsexual Charlie hopes to use his Irish charm to win the affections of 22-year-old Charlotte, who claims to have no gender boundaries. How will she feel when he tells her his secret? Retired market trader Billy (82) has his work cut out trying to tame divorced aromatherapist Sandra, and 20-year-old Rhys struggles to get a word in when he sits down for a date with chatty nanny Georgia.(n)

programme.title: Gogglebox

The programme captures their instant reactions and lively - sometimes emotional - discussions from the comfort of their own homes. Narrated by Caroline Aherne.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: After taking a job as a hostess at a restaurant, Audrey has to pretend she still works at the magazine when an old friend asks her for a favour. Meanwhile, Timmy tries to help Russell adjust to life without his trust fund, and Adam discovers Jen finds him too talkative.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Audrey joins Jeff at his company Christmas party, where they compete to see who is funnier. Elsewhere, the friends struggle to understand Russell's efforts to make everyone miserable until he makes a confession about his childhood. David Spade stars.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: When Joe and Ryder sell some of Mel's old belongings, they accidentally dispose of a very personal item that she wants to get back. Desperate to reclaim it, Mel and Joe turn to crime to achieve their aims. Elsewhere, Lennox discovers that her new pen pal wants to meet her in person. Comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Billie puts the sisters in jeopardy when she alerts a suspicious policeman to their existence while trying to save an innocent. Supernatural drama, with Kaley Cuoco-Sweeting, Holly Marie Combs, Rose McGowan and Alyssa Milano.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Mercedes and Lily support Scott, while Simone makes a life-changing decision. Elsewhere, Neeta once again helps Sally with dating, and Ryan gets up to no good.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: The reality road trip continues along the Spanish coast as the battle for alpha male heats up when the group take part in beach wrestling, before being tested at a waterfall abseil.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Bonnie realises how much she misses her ex-boyfriend Brad, so enlists Tucker's help to arrange a reunion. However when the former flame announces he still has feelings for her, Ben's misguided advice leads to him making a rash decision. Starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau, Tahj Mowry and Melissa Peterman.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Bonnie feels unappreciated for all the work she does for the boys and Emma, and decides to go on strike. However, Ben soon realises how much he needs his mother's help, and comes up with a way to get back into her good books.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Audrey tries to forge a deeper connection with Brenda, who agreed to be her surrogate, by arranging for her and Jeff to go on a double date with the woman and her girlfriend Becky. However, a big secret threatens to ruin the evening. Russell regrets taking his latest date to a magic show, and Adam tries to demonstrate his DIY prowess. Guest starring magician Criss Angel.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Audrey accepts a job as office manager for an internet start-up company to avoid a friend's constant intrusions, and Russell learns that Timmy has joined an a cappella group and decides to attend an audition himself.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.sub-title: What Happens in Jersey - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Joe's dying grandmother begs him to come and visit one last time on her birthday, and to bring his wife Tiffany along. He had failed to tell his family about the divorce, so Mel is forced to take a road trip to New Jersey and pose as his ex-wife at the party. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.sub-title: What Happens in Jersey - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. Joe's dying grandmother begs him to visit one last time on her birthday, and to bring his wife Tiffany along. Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, Ben grows grumpier about all the fuss surrounding the yuletide season, so he makes a wish that the holiday had never existed. However, when his wish is granted, he's completely unprepared for the consequences: Emma's existence is erased and everyone's lives are set on totally different courses.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.sub-title: She Loves Me, She Loves Me Note.
programme.desc: Ben starts to suspect that Riley might secretly be in love with Danny and comes up with a plan to find out the truth, while Bonnie takes extreme measures when she experiences financial problems. Comedy following the exploits of a man raising his infant daughter with help from his friends and family. Starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Ted prepares to move to New Jersey and argues with Marshall over who should pay a bill for the flat. The friends also reminisce about years gone by, and Barney poses as an old man. With Josh Radnor, Alyson Hannigan and Neil Patrick Harris.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: After her sister is jilted four days before her wedding, Stella offers to take over the ceremony with Ted. But when their former partners turn up, old feelings are stirred. Starring Josh Radnor and Sarah Chalke.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess accidentally walks in on a naked Nick while he is preparing for a date and dents his self-confidence with a nervous giggle. programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Cece stays the night and convinces Jess that Nick likes her as more than just a flatmate, and deals with amorous advances from Schmidt. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel, Hannah Simone, Jake Johnson and Max Greenfield.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta faces paying back all the money he has borrowed from his colleagues over the years, and goes to great lengths to keep a secret about Sergeant Jeffords. Santiago and Captain Holt team up to reopen the Brooklyn Broiler arson case.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: When Sophia's job gets in the way of her relationship with Peralta, he tries to win the favour of her boss Geoffrey (guest star Chris Parnell). Meanwhile, Deputy Chief Madeline Wuntch needs Captain Holt's help with a job recommendation.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is given the chance to square off against the one actor from the Star Trek franchise he holds a grudge against - Wil Wheaton. Meanwhile, Leonard asks Penny to set Howard up on a date with one of her friends. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard worries his lack of American football knowledge is alienating him from Penny and her friends. However, he finds an unlikely sporting tutor in the form of Sheldon, who reluctantly spent most of his childhood attending games with his father. Meanwhile, Raj is infuriated when Howard abandons him to pursue a girl at a kite-fighting contest.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Lily's journey home after a trip to Seattle is disrupted by a blizzard, which threatens to interfere with her routine of meeting Marshall at airports after work trips. Elsewhere, Ted and Barney offer to watch the bar at MacLaren's while they wait for their dates. Starring Alyson Hannigan and Jason Segel.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin faces being deported back to Canada unless she can find work in seven days, and after an unsuccessful interview for a newsreader position, Barney helps her create a video to impress a TV channel. With employment on their minds, the other gang members discuss various achievements on their CVs that are irrelevant to their current careers - including Lily's hot-dog eating title. Starring Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake is excited to work a case with the best detective in the NYPD, Dave Majors - until his colleague shares his intentions to ask Amy out on a date. Rosa's surprising fashion choice causes a stir, and Charles and Gina make an unexpected discovery. Comedy, with Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Holt begins to worry he is being set up for a fall by one of his superiors, and Peralta is handed the chance to work on an important case. Meanwhile, Jeffords tries to make sure his twins get a place at their chosen school. Comedy, with Andy Samberg and Terry Crews.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess tries to stop one of her pupils picking on a classmate - only to become the new target of the bully's wrath. Schmidt is desperate to brag about his Valentine's Day exploits, but finds his partner is far less keen, while Nick is plunged into despair by a gift from Julia.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Nick injures his back during a game of touch football, so Jess takes him to see a doctor. However, an initial scan reveals a potentially serious problem, forcing him to take stock of his life. His friends, meanwhile, are unsure what they can do to help.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon's flat is burgled, so they work on a state-of-the-art security system in a bid to outwit any future would-be thieves. However, their plans go awry when they ensnare Penny in a net. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon develops a mental block and has difficulty working on a formula, so in a move inspired by Albert Einstein he gets a job at the Cheesecake Factory diner to try to revive his creativity - and despite Penny's objections, proves surprisingly effective in the role. programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: A team of marine experts reveal the hidden stories of our planet's last true wilderness - its oceans. Here, they investigate how the predatory Humboldt squid is invading the sea.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: The team go in search of the weedy sea dragon and investigate why parts of the Southern Ocean are warming much faster than other oceans.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: An insight into the largely unexplored Southern Red Sea, which is teeming with marine life and home to some of the warmest waters on the planet.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: Explorer Paul Rose, environmentalist Philippe Cousteau Jr, maritime archaeologist Dr Lucy Blue and marine biologist Tooni Mahto base themselves in the Bahamas to explore the Atlantic. On the island of Andros, they go on a risky dive to discover what the oceans looked like 3.5 billion years ago, and investigate an underwater cave system thought to hold the remains of the first inhabitants.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: The first of two episodes exploring the Indian Ocean, which accounts for 13 per cent of Earth's surface and covers 26 million square miles. The expedition visits a `coral nursery', one of the few places in the world where an extraordinary technique is being used to repair damaged reefs. Paul Rose and the team also head to a small community in Mozambique where shark fishing is an established practice.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: In the second of two episodes examining the Indian Ocean, Paul Rose, Philippe Cousteau Jr, Dr Lucy Blue and Tooni Mahto explore the impact the ocean's tides and currents have on coastal areas. They join a group of scientists working on an experiment to predict extreme weather, and dive down to a coral colony - an environment in which they can learn about changes in the planet's climate.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: The crew embarks on a journey through the Mediterranean Sea, whose coasts are among the most densely populated in the world, to explore the profound effect man has had on the body of water. Paul Rose and the team also visit the remains of a Roman shipwreck and, under the cover of night, dive the Straits of Messina, hoping to find and film the sixgill shark - one of the largest predatory sharks in the world.(n)

programme.title: Oceans
programme.desc: The team explores the Arctic Ocean, one of the most hostile environments on Earth, yet one that plays a crucial part in controlling the climate of the planet. Paul Rose and the crew dive beneath the polar ice cap to examine how the ice, the dominant feature of the ocean, is shrinking and how this could affect the rest of the world. Last in the series.(n)

Alyssa, however, has set her romantic sights elsewhere but decides, nevertheless, to pursue a friendship with Holden(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: In a nondescript boxing ring, two fighters square off. Suddenly, fists in boxing gloves, they rush at each other - and us - with explosive force. The intensity of the combatants' blows belies the fact that they are friends engaging in a spirited round of fisticuffs. Vic Deakins, the older and more experienced of the two is definitely in control, giving his friend Riley Hale an impressive, if painful, boxing lesson. In addition to having a mentor/protégé relationship in the ring, the two are colleagues -- crack military pilots who are about to be handed a choice assignment to fly the top-secret B-3 Stealth bomber on a test run. Their cargo: two nuclear warheads(n)

programme.title: Burn Notice
programme.desc: Sam and Jesse head to the Dominican Republic, where they assist with Michael's undercover mission. Meanwhile, Fiona must help Maddie take care of a bookie attempting to collect on a debt. Jeffrey Donovan stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Members of the squad realise a teenager who was recently killed by his own pipe bomb was not working alone. As they race against the clock to prevent a massacre, they risk paying the ultimate price for their work. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda's parents visit, and pressure her into setting a date for the wedding. However, she cannot resist helping the squad investigate a murder, despite the presence of her guests. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames uncover how a rich woman's lust for fame and a professional fundraiser's desperation to pay off a loan shark may have led to the murder of two people. Police drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Goren and Eames are led to a terminally ill bank robber after a man is blown up by what he thought was a fake bomb. The pair discover the crook is planning to take both his own life and that of the accomplice he has enlisted to assist him with his final heist. Detective drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The bodies of five people, all of whom are identified as being from the US Navy, are found on the floor of a diner, and all are connected to a suspicious tax firm that specialises in helping people who are in arrears. When further killings are linked to the business, the team realises the crime seem to be copycats of previous cases. Meanwhile, two of Gibbs' ex-wives appear at the location with something important to discuss with the agent. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: American social worker Sarah Goode is taken hostage by militants in northern Syria, and thanks to the efforts of the Navy Seals, is eventually returned home unharmed. Evidence from the incident suggests US citizen Kyle Nasry was connected to the kidnapping, but when the agents trace Nasry to a rally held by a controversial imam, they are surprised to find Sarah among the attendees. Meanwhile, DiNozzo finally takes his relationship with Zoe Keates public - surprising none of his colleagues. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of an obese man who stole diamonds from his own shop is discovered in the boot of a car - and the team suspects his illusionist girlfriend might be involved in his death. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A known sex offender is suspected of raping several women and murdering one in her home. His lawyer proves to be a match for Brenda, putting the team at risk of losing the case. Starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: Eames and Goren's investigation into the murder of a pharmaceutical salesman found cut in half uncovers a web of corruption involving fraud, bribery, identity theft and a conspiracy to sell contaminated blood. Detective drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio and Kathryn Erbe.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.desc: A girl takes desperate measures to avenge the years of abuse and neglect inflicted upon her by her psychotherapist parents. The events that follow culminate in tragedy for a man caught up in their promiscuity, mind games and competitiveness. Detective drama, starring Vincent D'Onofrio, Kathryn Erbe and Jamey Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and his colleagues investigate when Eric Kutzler, the first openly gay Navy lieutenant tipped to receive the Medal of Honour, is murdered. While the agents initially suspect Kutzler's death was the result of a hate crime, the fact that his police officer husband waited 20 minutes to report the crime suggests he had something to hide. Meanwhile, the team throws a baby shower for Palmer as his wife's due date approaches. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: DiNozzo investigates a murder at the military academy he once attended, after a murdered marine and alumni of the school is found clutching a photo of a current student. Meanwhile, Bishop and her husband invite the team out for a special dinner. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: Prison Break
programme.desc: Michael, Whip and Ja make a last, desperate attempt to escape Ogygia, and while Lincoln races to help them, T-Bag meets with Kellerman to find out more about Michael's reappearance.(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Kyle draws closer to locating Sidney, and Anderson makes contact with an unexpected potential ally. Meanwhile, a prominent resident of Rome is revealed to be an enemy agent.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Meg travels to Europe in a bid to journey across the continent, but when she is kidnapped, Brian and Stewie undertake a daring rescue operation. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Mila Kunis and Seth Green.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter's business is shut down by city hall, so he responds by joining the Tea Party. With his new-found allies, he decides to get revenge, and ends up shutting down the government. Meanwhile, as Quahog descends into chaos, Carter reaps the benefits. Animated comedy, with the voice of creator Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Klaus discovers his original human body, but when Stan refuses to help him switch back, the fish comes up with a fitting form of revenge. Animated comedy about a man who works for the CIA and is constantly on the alert for terrorist activity.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve and Snot use a cloning machine to produce two women who will agree to date them, having been thwarted in their attempts to pair up with a couple of girls for the upcoming high-school prom. Meanwhile, there are disastrous consequences when Stan takes home the CIA's cloned pet, Daren the Dodo.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian and Stewie use a hi-tech remote control to visit alternative realities, including a post-apocalyptic world run by dogs with humans as their pets and the Robot Chicken universe. Animation, featuring the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois goes to see the family doctor, who looks into her history and discovers she is Jewish, a revelation that pleases Peter - until a visit from the spirit of his dead father changes his mind.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine becomes bored with her love life so tries to suggest different ways Stan can spice things up between them - and soon develops a passion for spanking. Meanwhile, Hayley tries to move on from Jeff being sent into outer space and agrees to go out on a dinner date with Snot.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan gets amnesia after falling off an arcade game during a CIA operation and Francine sees it as the perfect opportunity to mould him into her ideal husband. Meanwhile, Steve is drawn into the corrupt side of Roger's paper route business.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: You Can't Do That on Television, Peter.
programme.desc: Peter's favourite TV programme is cancelled, prompting him to take matters into his own hands and create a new series for children - in which he has the starring role. Meanwhile, Meg begins an internship with Dr Hartman at the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Stewie meets a kindred spirit who shares his love of advanced weaponry, and Lois buys twin beds when she grows tired of being crushed by Peter, who subsequently struggles to fall asleep without a night-time cuddle. With guest star Cate Blanchett.(n)

Sin City author Frank Miller's sweeping take on the historic Battle of Thermopylae comes to the screen courtesy of Dawn of the Dead director Zack Snyder. Gerard Butler stars as Spartan King Leonidas and Lena Headey plays Queen Gorgo. The massive army of the Persian Empire is sweeping across the globe, crushing every force that dares stand in its path. When a Persian envoy arrives in Sparta offering King Leonidas power over all of Greece if he will only bow to the will of the all powerful Xerxes (Rodrigo Santoro), the strong-willed leader assembles a small army comprised of his empire's best fighters and marches off to battle. Though they have virtually no hope of defeating Xerxes' intimidating battalion, Leonidas' men soldier on, intent on letting it be known they will bow to no man but their king. Meanwhile, back in Sparta, the loyal Queen Gorgo attempts to convince both the skeptical council and the devious Theron (Dominic West) to send more troops despite the fact that many view Leonidas' unsanctioned war march as a serious transgression. As Xerxes' fearsome "immortals" draw near, a few noble Greeks vow to assist the Spartans on the battlefield. When King Leonidas and his 300 Spartan warriors fell to the overwhelming Persian army at the Battle of Thermopylae, the fearless actions of the noble fighters inspired all of Greece to stand up against their Persian enemy and wage the battle that would ultimately give birth to the modern concept of democracy(n)

programme.desc: Peter and Bobby Farrelly finally deliver their long-gestating reboot of The Three Stooges with this 20th Century Fox production. programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Like Father, Like Clown. Bart Simpson (voice of Nancy Cartwright) is a loyal fan of children's entertainer Krusty the Clown (voice of Dan Castellaneta), but when Krusty finally takes Bart up on an invitation to dine with his family, he learns the clown is not a very happy man. After Krusty is asked to say grace, the Simpsons discover that he's Jewish and that the source of his depression is his father, Rabbi Krustofski (voice of Jackie Mason), who disowned his son when he chose to go into show business rather than become a rabbi in accordance with family tradition. As Lisa (voice of Yeardley Smith) so eloquently puts it, "A man who envies our family is a man who needs help," so Bart and Lisa take it upon themselves to reunite Krusty with his father; they soon learn, however, that Rabbi Krustofski is a very stubborn man. "Like Father, Like Clown" first aired on October 24, 1991(n)

programme.desc: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to the magical world accompanied by their selfish cousin. They join their old friend King Caspian as he sets sail across the sea in search of seven of his father's allies who had been banished years before, but along the way they discover an evil force is growing in strength. Fantasy adventure, with Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, Will Poulter and Ben Barnes.(n)

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: An alcoholic former professional player reluctantly agrees to train an all-female baseball team during the Second World War. Comedy drama, starring Geena Davis, Lori Petty, Tom Hanks and Madonna.(n)

programme.title: Short Circuit 2

Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Fisher Stevens, Michael McKean, Cynthia Gibb and Jack Weston, with the voice of Tim Blaney.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: An American youngster goes to live in China with his mother, where he becomes an outsider and falls foul of the local bullies. He receives help from the kindly school caretaker, who turns out to be a kung fu master and offers to train the boy to defend himself. Martial arts drama, with Jaden Smith and Jackie Chan.(n)

programme.title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
programme.desc: A timid farmer abandoned by his girlfriend is fascinated by a mysterious woman who rides into his frontier town. He tries to act the part of a gunslinging Wild West hero to impress her, only to find himself facing a showdown with her notorious outlaw husband. Western spoof, directed by and starring Seth MacFarlane, with Charlize Theron and Liam Neeson.(n)

programme.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
programme.desc: An old man tells a journalist the story of his youth as a lobby boy at a hotel in Eastern Europe in the 1930s. He was taken under the wing of the establishment's dashing concierge, and is drawn into his misadventures as he becomes involved in a conflict over a valuable painting. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Ralph Fiennes, Tony Revolori, F Murray Abraham and Jude Law.(n)

programme.title: The Last Picture Show
programme.desc: Three teenagers living in an economically struggling town in the backwoods of Texas face an uncertain future. When a tragedy strikes the community, they are forced to choose between making the best of their lives at home or seeking their fortune elsewhere. Peter Bogdanovich's drama, starring Jeff Bridges, Cybill Shepherd, Timothy Bottoms, Cloris Leachman and Ben Johnson.(n)

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: German commander Rommel falls out of favour with Hitler following his defeat at El Alamein. On returning to his homeland, he is torn between his oath of loyalty and lack of faith in the Fuehrer's unstable leadership, prompting him to become involved in an assassination plot. Second World War drama, starring James Mason, Jessica Tandy, Cedric Hardwicke, Leo G Carroll and Luther Adler.(n)

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: A long-serving marshal, who has done his utmost to the keep peace in the town of Medicine Bend, looks forward to a reconciliation with his estranged wife, a touring musical star. Just as she arrives in town, three notorious criminals show up and start causing trouble - and the lawman has to decide whether to hang up his guns for his wife's sake or do his duty. Western, with Randolph Scott, Angela Lansbury, Jean Parker and Warner Anderson.(n)

programme.title: It Came from Beneath the Sea
programme.desc: The captain of a nuclear submarine battles a gigantic octopus threatening to destroy San Francisco. Monster adventure, starring Kenneth Tobey, Faith Domergue and Donald Curtis, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen.(n)

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper.(n)

programme.title: Seven Years in Tibet
programme.desc: An arrogant Austrian mountaineer tries to become the first to conquer a peak in India that has claimed the lives of 11 previous climbers. However, the outbreak of the Second World War leaves him languishing in a PoW camp. He escapes and ends up in the holy city of Lhasa, where he befriends the 14-year-old Dalai Lama and learns the meaning of inner peace. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, David Thewlis and BD Wong.(n)

programme.title: The Monuments Men
programme.desc: Seven experts in fine art are assembled into a military platoon during the Second World War, and given an unusual mission. They are sent into occupied Europe to recover priceless works of art that have fallen into Nazi hands and ensure the masterpieces survive the conflict. Fact-based drama, directed by and starring George Clooney. With Matt Damon, Bill Murray and Cate Blanchett.(n)

programme.title: The Counsellor
programme.desc: A lawyer who earns a living representing drug dealers makes a fateful decision to take an active role in their criminal activities. He quickly finds himself out of his depth in a criminal underworld he barely understands, where his actions bring deadly consequences. Ridley Scott's crime thriller, starring Michael Fassbender, Penelope Cruz, Cameron Diaz, Javier Bardem and Brad Pitt.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver travels around Europe and north Africa to experience local cultures through their cuisine, beginning in Marrakech, where he tries street food, visits a communal bread oven, makes a nomad stew and joins a family for lunch to sample Moroccan home cooking.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver seeks the authentic tastes of Spain in Andalucia. He makes paella for the whole town of Ronda, birthplace of modern bullfighting, and is taught how to cut serrano ham by an award-winning father and son team. As he joins in the local festivities, including carrying a giant statue of the Virgin Mary from church to church, he takes time to cook tomato salad with chorizo, pork chops with Spanish beans, and quail's egg with black pudding.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Swedish capital, where he tries reindeer heart at an old indoor market and catches a boat to pick wild mushrooms and blueberries on one of the city's surrounding islands. He also tries fermented herring, heads to the royal palace to check the guards' menu, and prepares gravadlax, blueberry buns, creamy mushrooms, pike perch and roasted beetroot salad.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver steers away from the tourist trails in Venice as he explores the gastronomy of the Italian city. He prepares spaghetti vongole for a group of local fishermen, is taught the art of the perfect risotto by Ruggero Bovo, samples prosecco and cooks a bellini with beef carpaccio. The chef also tries his hand at minestrone with vegetables before being joined by old friend Gennaro Contaldo to make a Venetian tiramisu.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the villages surrounding Toulouse in the French Pyrenees, an area renowned for its artisan food. He goes truffle-hunting and prepares an omelette with the pickings, learns how to make bread in the traditional way, and joins locals for a wild boar hunt. The chef also shows how to prepare tarte Tatin, Roquefort salad, confit of duck and a country-style terrine.(n)

programme.title: Jamie Does
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver visits the Greek capital, where he heads to the street markets for his take on the local fast food - souvlaki and kebabs. The chef then learns how honey is made, teams up with a cheese-making priest and milks a goat, and prepares a selection of recipes including fisherman's stew, Greek salad, pistachio and honey cake, and a tuna dish.(n)
