When the disappearance of an otter hints at a terrible conspiracy in the city, she enlists the aid of a con-artist fox in solving the mystery. Disney animated comedy, with the voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley.(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: A computer genius hacks into the mainframe of the company he used to work for, hoping to find evidence against the executive who stole his ideas. However, the intelligent master program running the system transports him into an electronic world, where he is forced to battle gladiators in a series of deadly games. Disney sci-fi adventure, starring Jeff Bridges, Bruce Boxleitner and David Warner.(n)

programme.title: Shipwrecked
programme.desc: A youngster joins a sailing ship to raise money to save his parents' farm, but soon finds himself mixed up in adventure after being thrown overboard and washed up on an island inhabited by a gang of pirates. Disney adventure, starring Gabriel Byrne, Stian Smestad and Louisa Haigh.(n)

programme.title: Benji the Hunted
programme.desc: Talented mongrel Benji is separated from his trainer in a shipwreck and ends up stranded in the Canadian wilderness - where he becomes foster father to a litter of orphaned cougar cubs. However, a hungry timber wolf is also prowling in the area, and looks set to clash with the courageous dog. Disney adventure, starring Red Steagall, Frank Inn and Nancy Francis.(n)

programme.title: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
programme.desc: Father Christmas's festive preparations are disrupted when mischievous Jack Frost turns up at the North Pole on a secret mission to sabotage the toy factory. To add to Santa's woes, the parents of the pregnant Mrs Claus come to stay. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Tim Allen, Martin Short, Elizabeth Mitchell and Alan Arkin.(n)

programme.title: Brave
programme.desc: A princess defies her mother's plans to secure peace by marrying her off to the son of one of their allies. A witch provides the rebellious royal with a magic spell to change her fate, but the enchantment backfires disastrously when the queen is transformed into a bear. Pixar's animated fantasy, with the voices of Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson and Billy Connolly.(n)

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: A teenager with a promising academic future causes consternation for her family when she sets her sights on becoming a professional ice skater. Luckily, a former champion of the sport is on hand to offer training and advice. Comedy drama, starring Michelle Trachtenberg, Kim Cattrall, Joan Cusack and Hayden Panettiere, alongside a host of professional skaters.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright.(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Journey
programme.desc: The owners of a cat and two dogs leave their pets with a friend in a remote area of Canada while they take a holiday abroad. When the minder embarks on a hunting trip, the three animals find themselves unattended and set out on a hazardous journey through the wilderness to get back home. Disney adventure, starring Emile Genest and John Drainie.(n)

programme.title: Jungle 2 Jungle
programme.desc: A businessman ventures deep into the Amazon to look for his estranged doctor wife seeking a divorce, only to discover he has a 13-year-old son who has been raised as part of a jungle tribe. The boy is sent back to New York with his father, but has a lot to learn about the modern world. Comedy, starring Tim Allen, Lolita Davidovich, Martin Short, JoBeth Williams and Sam Huntington.(n)

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright.(n)

programme.title: Lady and the Tramp
programme.desc: A pet cocker spaniel fears her owners will reject her when they become parents, and the arrival of two villainous siamese cats in the house leaves her feeling more unwelcome. Driven from her home, she encounters a roguish stray mongrel, who introduces her to his carefree life on the streets. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Barbara Luddy, Larry Roberts and Peggy Lee.(n)

programme.title: The Finest Hours
programme.desc: An oil tanker suffers devastating damage while caught in a fierce Atlantic storm, which breaks the vessel in two. While an engineer tries to keep the crew members trapped in the sinking wreckage alive, members of the Coast Guard brave the deadly conditions to come to their rescue. Fact-based disaster movie, starring Chris Pine, Casey Affleck and Eric Bana.(n)

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck barman is having a hard time coping after his wife leaves him and he loses his teaching job. His fortunes turn around when the American football team he has supported all his life holds open trials and, against all odds, he wins a place on the squad. Fact-based sporting drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear and Elizabeth Banks.(n)

programme.title: The Watcher in the Woods
programme.desc: Two sisters are haunted by a ghost when they and their American family move into an old mansion set deep in an English forest. As the spirit makes more and more contact with them, the girls come to realise that the spirit is the ghost of the owner's child who went missing long ago. Thriller, starring Bette Davis, Carroll Baker, David McCallum and Lynn-Holly Johnson.(n)

programme.title: Lost & Found
programme.desc: Sent to spend the summer on a remote and mysterious island, teenage brothers embark on a thrilling treasure hunt to restore their family's lost fortune. Adventure, starring Jason Patric, Justin Kelly, Benjamin Stockham and Celeste Desjardins.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: A Roman commander is posted to Britain in the last days of the empire and given a final mission to rescue a high-ranking official and his son stranded in the north. However, the endeavour reveals his true destiny is to lead the Britons against the new Saxon invasion, and marks the start of a legend. Historical adventure, starring Clive Owen, Keira Knightley, Ray Winstone, Ioan Gruffudd and Stephen Dillane.(n)

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenager at a new school befriends a pretty girl, but her ex-boyfriend is jealous and attacks him. During one particularly bad fight, a wise old caretaker intervenes and defeats the youngster's assailants using his martial art skills. He goes on to mentor the boy and teach him karate so he can face his enemies in a tournament. Drama, with Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Elisabeth Shue.(n)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Philadelphia brawler Rocky Balboa gets a shot at the world heavyweight title when current champion Apollo Creed decides to give an unknown boxer a chance in celebration of America's bicentennial. Oscar-winning drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young and Carl Weathers.(n)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson.(n)

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: A manned mission to Mars is abruptly abandoned, with one crew member left for dead. However, the astronaut has survived and faces a series of challenges - to contact Earth and arrange his rescue and to survive for the years it will take for a spacecraft to reach him on resources intended to last a month. Ridley Scott's sci-fi drama based on the novel by Andy Weir, starring Matt Damon, Jessica Chastain, Kristen Wiig and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity plunges an ordinary man into the middle of a war between crime syndicates. With no means of proving who he really is, he finds himself forced to pay off a friend's debt to an underworld kingpin by assassinating a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Josh Hartnett, Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Morgan Freeman and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Underworld
programme.desc: A vampire fights a war against werewolves that has raged for centuries, with the human race oblivious to the conflict. She falls in love with a mortal man who has wandered unwittingly into the midst of a conflict, and must protect him from both the enemy, who have plans for him, and her own side. Supernatural action thriller, starring Kate Beckinsale, Scott Speedman, Michael Sheen and Bill Nighy.(n)

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: The Man of Steel meets his match in the form of three fugitive villains from his home planet of Krypton. Flying down to Earth, the super-powered trio unleash a reign of terror in a bid to take over the world - but Superman is not there to stop them, having surrendered his powers to lead a normal life with his beloved Lois Lane. Comic-strip adventure sequel, with Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Terence Stamp and Margot Kidder.(n)

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: Secret agent Black Widow is forced into an uneasy alliance with vigilante the Punisher on a vital mission. A notorious terrorist organisation has stolen dangerous top-secret technology, and it falls to the mismatched pair to stop them selling it to the highest bidder. Animated comic-book adventure, with the voices of Jennifer Carpenter and Brian Bloom.(n)

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario.(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin, who exists at the beck and call of a mysterious organisation, fails in his latest mission, and becomes a target himself, as security forces worldwide become aware of his existence and a rival agent is assigned to tie up loose ends. Action thriller, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko.(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto.(n)

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: A government agent teams up with a gadget-mad master of disguise to investigate the disappearance of several scientists. Their search leads them to an evil genius who is plotting to kill the US president with some bizarre inventions of his own. Sci-fi Western comedy, starring Will Smith, Kevin Kline, Kenneth Branagh, Salma Hayek and Ted Levine.(n)

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: A ruthless warlord resolves to rid the desert of its few remaining tribes, prompting them to seek the help of a legendary assassin to end the despot's reign of terror by destroying his source of power - a beautiful but deadly sorceress. Fantasy action adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, Steven Brand, Kelly Hu and Michael Clarke Duncan.(n)

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario.(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin, who exists at the beck and call of a mysterious organisation, fails in his latest mission, and becomes a target himself, as security forces worldwide become aware of his existence and a rival agent is assigned to tie up loose ends. Action thriller, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko.(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto.(n)

programme.title: True Lies
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary computer salesman leads a double life as a secret agent battling international terrorism. His naive wife is unaware of his dual employment, and goes in search of adventure - only to end up in the clutches of terrorists who have stolen a nuclear weapon. James Cameron's action comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jamie Lee Curtis and Tom Arnold.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.(n)

programme.title: Executive Decision
programme.desc: Terrorists armed with the world's most lethal nerve gas take over an airliner and demand a massive ransom - and only a crack team of intelligence experts can stop them before they carry out their threat to destroy Washington, DC. Action thriller, starring Kurt Russell, Steven Seagal, Halle Berry, Oliver Platt, David Suchet and John Leguizamo.(n)

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Soviet submarine commander creates an international crisis by piloting his experimental nuclear vessel, which is invisible to sonar, toward the American coast. The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Alive
programme.desc: A plane carrying a college rugby team smashes into a mountain in the Andes, leaving the survivors stranded in unbearably bleak conditions. As supplies dwindle, they are faced with the horrifying prospect of eating their dead to ensure they make it through the ordeal. Fact-based drama, starring Ethan Hawke, Vincent Spano and Josh Hamilton.(n)

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A husband and wife take a yachting trip to help recover from the death of their son. While out on the open water the couple spot a sinking ship and manage to save the only person left on board - but they come to bitterly regret their good deed when the situation turns dark and a fraught battle of wits ensues. Thriller, based on a novel by Charles Williams, with Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman and Billy Zane.(n)

programme.title: Executive Decision
programme.desc: Terrorists armed with the world's most lethal nerve gas take over an airliner and demand a massive ransom - and only a crack team of intelligence experts can stop them before they carry out their threat to destroy Washington, DC. Action thriller, starring Kurt Russell, Steven Seagal, Halle Berry, Oliver Platt, David Suchet and John Leguizamo.(n)

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October
programme.desc: A Soviet submarine commander creates an international crisis by piloting his experimental nuclear vessel, which is invisible to sonar, toward the American coast. The US and Russian navies think he is planning to attack and set out to destroy the submarine, but a CIA analyst suspects he intends to defect to the West. Cold War thriller, based on Tom Clancy's novel, starring Sean Connery, Alec Baldwin and James Earl Jones.(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney.(n)

programme.title: Dead Calm
programme.desc: A husband and wife take a yachting trip to help recover from the death of their son. While out on the open water the couple spot a sinking ship and manage to save the only person left on board - but they come to bitterly regret their good deed when the situation turns dark and a fraught battle of wits ensues. Thriller, based on a novel by Charles Williams, with Sam Neill, Nicole Kidman and Billy Zane.(n)

programme.title: Turbulence
programme.desc: A convicted killer breaks free while being flown to his place of execution on Christmas eve, and embarks on a murderous rampage, leaving a plucky stewardess with the harrowing task of outwitting him. Thriller, starring Ray Liotta, Lauren Holly, Brendan Gleeson, Ben Cross and Hector Elizondo.(n)

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent is assigned to protect a witness in the trial of a feared crime boss. However, when they board their flight from Hawaii to Los Angeles, the gangster's henchmen set in motion their plan to smuggle onto the aircraft and then release 450 poisonous snakes. Thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson, Julianna Margulies and Jonathan Phillips.(n)

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: The captain of an American destroyer in the South Atlantic is still recovering from the sinking of his previous vessel. He tries to outwit a cunning German U-boat commander, but comes to respect the courage of his enemy. However, his crew fears he is not up to the challenge of defeating his opponent. Second World War thriller, starring Robert Mitchum, Curt Jurgens, Theodore Bikel and David Hedison.(n)

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: Sandra, a former pop star who put her career on hold to have a baby, suspects her producer-husband is now having an affair with a younger rising starlet. Determined to catch him out, she decides to surprise him by driving to Los Angeles with her young son in her new Monolith, a `super-car' with advanced security features. However, a series of unfortunate events leaves Sandra locked out of the car in the middle of the desert, while her son is trapped inside, and in mortal peril. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden.(n)

programme.title: McCanick
programme.desc: A narcotics cop learns a small-time crook has been released from prison and goes behind the chief of police's back to organise a disproportionate manhunt for him. As his methods grow increasingly brutal, he comes closer to learning a secret from his own past. Detective drama, starring David Morse and Cory Monteith, in his final film role.(n)

programme.title: Careful What You Wish For
programme.desc: A teenager gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker, as a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal. Thriller, starring Nick Jonas, Dermot Mulroney and Isabel Lucas.(n)

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: The daughter of a respected actor becomes bored with her high society lifestyle and trains to become a bounty hunter. However, the thrills of her new occupation, coupled with the presence of television cameras recording her exploits for a reality TV show, soon send her life spiralling out of control. Thriller, starring Keira Knightley, Mickey Rourke and Jacqueline Bisset.(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman.(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A quadriplegic ex-cop is saved from the brink of suicide by a rookie female officer needing his expertise to form a psychological profile of a serial killer. The murderer is posing as a cab driver and terrorising Manhattan, and has a gruesome habit of taking trophies from his victims' bodies. Thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Angelina Jolie, Michael Rooker, Mike McGlone, Luis Guzman and Queen Latifah.(n)

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: Sandra, a former pop star who put her career on hold to have a baby, suspects her producer-husband is now having an affair with a younger rising starlet. Determined to catch him out, she decides to surprise him by driving to Los Angeles with her young son in her new Monolith, a `super-car' with advanced security features. However, a series of unfortunate events leaves Sandra locked out of the car in the middle of the desert, while her son is trapped inside, and in mortal peril. Thriller, starring Katrina Bowden.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon
programme.desc: An unstable Vietnam veteran cop teams up with a by-the-book Los Angeles police detective to investigate the apparent suicide of the daughter of a wealthy businessman, leading them to a violent and bloody confrontation with a ruthless drug cartel under the control of a retired US general. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan and Tom Atkins.(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: A tight-knit FBI team is torn apart when the daughter of one of the agents is raped and murdered, and the case goes unsolved. Years later, a member of the team uncovers a new clue that he hopes will allow him to bring the killer to justice. However, the victim's grieving mother is dissatisfied with the law and takes matters into her own hands. Crime drama, starring Julia Roberts, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Nicole Kidman.(n)

programme.title: The Smuggler
programme.desc: The police intercept a suspected drugs mule they believe has swallowed condoms filled with heroin on his re-entry to his native Australia. He can only be charged after the illicit substance is ejected by his body - so he spends the next week incarcerated with the authorities keeping an eye on his every movement. Comedy drama, starring Hugo Weaving, Angus Sampson and Leigh Whannell.(n)

programme.title: The Phantom of the Opera
programme.desc: A disfigured composer lurks in the catacombs beneath a Paris opera house, giving rise to stories that the building is haunted. The lonely maestro becomes infatuated with a talented young singer, and plans to turn her into a star. However, his love for her is doomed to end in tragedy. Adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical, starring Gerard Butler, Emmy Rossum, Miranda Richardson and Minnie Driver.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A shy English boy joins the senior class at Rydell High and immediately falls for the leader of the Pink Ladies. But she is only interested in tough guys, forcing him to adopt a dual identity as a mysterious biker. Musical sequel, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft, Eve Arden and Sid Caesar, with Didi Conn reprising her role as Frenchy from the original film.(n)

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: A naval nurse falls in love with a French plantation owner on an American-held island during the Second World War. However, dark secrets surface from his past and result in her having to leave the colony and embark on a perilous mission with the help of a US Navy officer. Romantic musical based on the Rodgers and Hammerstein Broadway show, with Mitzi Gaynor, Rossano Brazzi, John Kerr and Ray Walston.(n)

programme.title: The Sound of Music
programme.desc: A cheerful novice nun is employed as governess to the seven children of an austere widower. As she brings light, laughter and a love of all things harmonious to a family previously beset by grief and strict discipline she also falls in love with her employer. But before long, the looming threat of the Second World War jeopardises their happy household. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer and Eleanor Parker.(n)

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: An idealistic writer is drawn to the decadent backstreets of Paris, determined to play a part in the bohemian revolution. He falls for a courtesan from the famous Moulin Rouge, but a scheming duke also covets her affections, setting the scene for tragedy. Baz Luhrmann's romantic musical, with Ewan McGregor, Nicole Kidman, Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh and John Leguizamo. Featuring reworkings of pop songs by Nirvana, David Bowie, Elton John and others.(n)

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: Rebellious American teenager Danny falls for innocent Australian girl Sandy during the summer holidays, but when he later finds out she is a new student at his school, he risks losing her love by trying to act cool in front of his friends. Romantic musical set in the 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.(n)

programme.title: Grease 2
programme.desc: A shy English boy joins the senior class at Rydell High and immediately falls for the leader of the Pink Ladies. But she is only interested in tough guys, forcing him to adopt a dual identity as a mysterious biker. Musical sequel, starring Michelle Pfeiffer, Maxwell Caulfield, Lorna Luft, Eve Arden and Sid Caesar, with Didi Conn reprising her role as Frenchy from the original film.(n)

programme.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
programme.desc: A young strait-laced couple stranded by a storm take shelter in an eerie castle, where they are enticed into the weird world of a menagerie of debauched characters - presided over by a mad sex-crazed transvestite scientist - and undergo a startling transformation as they let go of their inhibitions. Cult musical, with Tim Curry, Susan Sarandon, Barry Bostwick and the show's creator Richard O'Brien.(n)

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: An idealistic writer is drawn to the decadent backstreets of Paris, determined to play a part in the bohemian revolution. He falls for a courtesan from the famous Moulin Rouge, but a scheming duke also covets her affections, setting the scene for tragedy. Baz Luhrmann's romantic musical, with Ewan McGregor, Nicole Kidman, Jim Broadbent, Richard Roxburgh and John Leguizamo. Featuring reworkings of pop songs by Nirvana, David Bowie, Elton John and others.(n)

programme.title: The King and I
programme.desc: The relationship between the powerful King of Siam and a widowed English schoolteacher, recruited to tutor his wives and many children, begins with restrained hostility - but gradually gives way to more tender feelings. Oscar-winning Rodgers and Hammerstein musical, starring Deborah Kerr, Yul Brynner, Rita Moreno, Martin Benson and Terry Saunders.(n)

programme.title: Niagara
programme.desc: Polly and Ray are on honeymoon at Niagara Falls where they meet George and Rose, whose own marriage is falling apart. Polly later discovers that the brazen and alluring Rose has a lover waiting in the shadows and they are scheming to kill the emotionally unstable George - but the newlywed is unable to convince anyone of the danger as the murder plot edges toward a tragic conclusion. Thriller, with Marilyn Monroe, Joseph Cotten and Jean Peters.(n)

programme.title: Wuthering Heights
programme.desc: The head of a Yorkshire family takes in a mysterious boy, who is treated cruelly by the rest of the household but develops a close bond with his foster sister. Over the years to come as they both grow up, their relationship grows more intense, with devastating repercussions for all concerned. Period drama, based on Emily Bronte's novel, starring Ralph Fiennes and Juliette Binoche.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A food critic realises she is in love with her best friend just as he announces he is going to marry another woman. Determined to have him to herself, she heads for the wedding with the intention of sabotaging the ceremony - but persuading the groom to give up on his bride-to-be proves harder than expected. Romantic comedy, starring Julia Roberts, Dermot Mulroney, Cameron Diaz and Rupert Everett.(n)

programme.title: All Roads Lead to Rome
programme.desc: A teacher is reunited with her ex-boyfriend while staying in an Italian village. The former lovers are forced to work together when her teenage daughter and his 80-year-old mother steal a car and run away to Rome together, the former hoping to return home to her boyfriend and the latter planning to remarry against her son's wishes. Romantic comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker, Raoul Bova and Claudia Cardinale.(n)

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: A chauffeur's daughter falls for the womanising son of her father's employer, but he ignores her. However, after a long sojourn in Paris, she returns, having matured into a beautiful and poised young woman. The handsome playboy is totally smitten - even though he is on the verge of getting married. So to save the wedding, his older brother tries to romance her himself. Remake of Billy Wilder's romantic comedy, with Harrison Ford, Julia Ormond and Greg Kinnear.(n)

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Two single women living on opposite sides of the Atlantic agree to exchange houses over the Christmas holidays. In their new surroundings, both women unexpectedly encounter prospective partners, but as the house swap draws to a close, difficult decisions have to be made about their blossoming relationships. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Kate Winslet, Jack Black, Jude Law and Eli Wallach.(n)

programme.title: Steve Jobs
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's biopic of the technology entrepreneur, exploring his life through three pivotal moments over the course of 14 years. Jobs is passionately driven to revolutionise computing technology, but his dreams come at a price, with a devastating impact on both is relationship with his family and his own health. Starring Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet and Seth Rogen.(n)

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: A washed-up pop idol is given the chance to write a song for a teenage star - but despite his musical talents, he has never written a lyric in his life. However, the discovery that the woman who looks after his plants has a way with words marks the start of a beautiful relationship. Romantic comedy, starring Hugh Grant, Drew Barrymore, Brad Garret and Kristen Johnston.(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: A widowed mother moves from New York City to Los Angeles to be with her daughter, but her well-meaning, meddlesome ways drive her offspring up the wall. Comedy-drama, starring Susan Sarandon, Rose Byrne and JK Simmons.(n)

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: A failed rock star carves out a career as a popular wedding singer, but his hopes for a bright future are dashed when his fiancee jilts him at the altar and he tries to shut himself off from the outside world. At one of his functions, a waitress catches his eye - but unfortunately for him, she is already engaged to someone else. Romantic comedy set in the 1980s, starring Adam Sandler and Drew Barrymore.(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: An all-American family adopts a huge St Bernard, but the father is dismayed when it turns into a one-dog disaster zone. He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny.(n)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Anti-social ogre Shrek resolves to stop an evil ruler from banishing fairy-tale characters to his swampland home. However, the reluctant hero ends up forced to rescue the beautiful Princess Fiona from a castle guarded by a dragon, aided only by a wisecracking donkey. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, John Lithgow, Cameron Diaz, Eddie Murphy and Vincent Cassel.(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis.(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.(n)

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez.(n)

programme.title: Toys
programme.desc: A dying toy-maker leaves the company to his brother, a power-mad general, who turns the friendly family factory over to the production of weapons. It falls to the general's zany nephew and his equally childlike sister to stand up for their father's benign world-view. Comedy, starring Robin Williams, Michael Gambon, Joan Cusack and Donald O'Connor.(n)

programme.title: Dennis
programme.desc: A well-meaning little boy with an inability to stay out of trouble is the bane of his curmudgeonly neighbour, Mr Wilson. But when a thief steals Wilson's coin collection, the tiny terror seizes the chance to make amends and come to the rescue. Slapstick comedy based on the comic strip, starring Walter Matthau, Mason Gamble, Joan Plowright, Christopher Lloyd and Lea Thompson.(n)

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: The fur flies when a pampered California pooch is sent to live with a wise cracking farm hound. However, when a couple of bumbling thieves attempt to break into their home, they must put aside their differences to defend their home. Family comedy, starring Joris Jarsky, Ryan Belleville and Dylan Schmid.(n)

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement.(n)

programme.title: Survive the Serengeti: Against the Wild 2
programme.desc: When their plane crash-lands in the African bush, two bickering siblings find themselves force to rely on their wits - and their courageous dog - to help them conquer their fears and survive. Adventure, starring Jeri Ryan, John Paul Ruttan and Ella Ballentine.(n)

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell.(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tale of Two Kitties
programme.desc: The lazy moggy stows away in his owner's luggage and ends up in London. He is promptly mistaken for an English upper-class cat, who has recently inherited a grand estate, and moves into his stately home - much to the dismay of the real aristocratic feline's conniving relation, who is bent on swindling him out of his money. Family comedy, starring Breckin Meyer, Billy Connolly and Jennifer Love Hewitt, with the voices of Bill Murray and Tim Curry.(n)

However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks' every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley.(n)

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr.(n)

programme.desc: Grieving after the death of her father, a troubled woman retreats to her best friend's lake house and spirals into despair. Psychological thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Katherine Waterston and Patrick Fugit.(n)

programme.desc: High school student Sadie has two weeks to ready herself before doomsday. In that time she needs to master survivalist cuisine, go to a high school party, kiss a boy and get her best friend back. Comedy, starring Morgan Taylor Campbell, Paula Brancati and Michael Brown.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mother's heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly travels to the 21st century, where he has to save his children from a terrible fate. However, this proves to have unforeseen consequences when the future version of arch enemy Biff sees a chance to rewrite history for his own benefit, leaving Marty stuck in a twisted parallel universe. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly is transported back to the days of the Wild West, where he strives to save his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown from death at the hands of a villainous gunslinger. Final instalment in the sci-fi comedy trilogy, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen and Thomas F Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Teenager Sam Witwicky is treated to his first car by his dad, but it turns out to be an alien scout with a life of its own. Before long, the vehicle embroils Sam in a long-running intergalactic war between two factions of giant shape-changing robots, which have come to Earth to find a mystical cube that grants infinite power to its possessor. Michael Bay's sci-fi action adventure, inspired by the toy franchise, with Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Jon Voight and John Turturro.(n)

programme.title: Warcraft
programme.desc: Conflict erupts between the defenders of a kingdom and an invading horde that has travelled from a dying world. Fantasy adventure based on the best-selling computer game, starring Travis Fimmel, Paula Patton and Ben Foster.(n)

programme.title: The Thing
programme.desc: A mysterious shape-shifting alien kills and impersonates its victims on an Antarctic research base manned by a crew of American scientists. The researchers face the ordeal of stopping the creature from making its way to civilisation - but are in danger of jeopardising the task as mounting paranoia turns them against each other. John Carpenter's sci-fi horror remake, starring Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, TK Carter, Keith David and Richard Dysart.(n)

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly is transported back to the days of the Wild West, where he strives to save his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown from death at the hands of a villainous gunslinger. Final instalment in the sci-fi comedy trilogy, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Mary Steenburgen and Thomas F Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Solaris
programme.desc: A psychiatrist arrives on a space station to investigate the death of its commanding officer but subsequently starts to experience frightening visions of his late wife - which seem all too real and force him to question his sanity. Sci-fi drama, directed by Steven Soderbergh and based on Stanislaw Lem's novel, starring George Clooney, Natascha McElhone, Viola Davis, Jeremy Davies and Ulrich Tukur.(n)

programme.title: Battle for the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A race of intelligent chimps vies with warlike gorillas and deadly mutant humans for control of a post-apocalyptic Earth. The fifth and final instalment in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Roddy McDowall, Claude Akins and Paul Williams, and featuring a cameo appearance by John Huston.(n)

programme.title: Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The son of the Greek god Zeus is raised by humans and grows up to reject his immortal heritage in anger at the gods' cruel treatment of humans. He sets out on a quest to find a means to kill the evil lord of the underworld in revenge for his father's death, facing all manner of strange creatures. Mythological adventure, with Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes and Gemma Arterton.(n)

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
programme.desc: John Connor finds his destiny to lead the human race in a future war is catching up with him when an advanced new Terminator in female form is sent back in time to eliminate him. However, a reprogrammed cyborg has also been dispatched to act as his protector. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nick Stahl, Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken.(n)

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a future dominated by the deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin.(n)

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell has been working alone at an energy-generating base on the moon for three years and desperately longs to return home. After he is injured in an accident, he begins to discover the disturbing truth about the operation he is running, and is forced to question his own identity. Sci-fi drama, starring Sam Rockwell, with the voice of Kevin Spacey.(n)

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Framed for a murder he didn't commit, an animated rabbit teams up with a down-on-his-luck private eye to clear his name(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Cool gadgets and great gimmicks abound as Antonio Banderas stars in this action-packed family movie. And for once the kids are the heroes...Gregorio and Ingrid are special agents who used to be special enemies, until they fell in love. They retired to raise a family, and now live a normal suburban life with their children Carmen and Juni. But the baddies just won't leave Gregorio and Ingrid alone, and kidnap them, leaving the children to rescue their parents and save the world from sinister cloned robo-kids and strange creatures made of thumbs. With gadgets of which James Bond would be pround, and a star-studded cast that also includes Teri Hatcher and Cheech Marin, this is top class family entertainment that was a big box office hit(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
programme.desc: The intrepid junior agents have a showdown in another dimension with evil genius The Toymaker(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell the Damn Joke
programme.desc: Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with a comedy special that holds no punches and calls it like it is(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Shattered Glass director Billy Ray directs Chris Cooper and Ryan Philippe in this fact-based drama concerning the FBI traitor who carried out what many historians refer to as the most notable national security breach in U.S. history. A key member of the FBI's elite Soviet Analytical Unit, Robert Hanssen (Chris Cooper) would, for 15 years beginning in 1985, sell thousands of pages of classified documents to the Soviets. After making roughly 600,000 dollars on his clandestine endeavor and compromising everything from the identities of KGB spies working for the American government to nuclear war contingency plans, Hanssen was eventually transferred to a newly created position at the FBI's Washington headquarters and assigned the task of guarding his country's most sensitive secrets. It was while working in this capacity that a young agent named Eric O'Neill (Phillipe) was assigned the task of keeping tabs on Hanssen by suspicious higher-ups. Later, after being arrested while delivering a cache of secret documents to a "dead drop" spot in a Virginia park, the notorious traitor was arrested and sentenced to life in prison with no chance for parole(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Four teens living in inner-city Cleveland (Jorge Lendeborg Jr., Moisés Arias, Rafi Gavron, and Ezri Walker) steal cars to support their dream of becoming pro skateboarders, and discover a large stash of pills during one heist. When they decide to sell the drugs themselves, they are targeted by an organic-food proprietor who's secretly a local crime boss (Linda Emond). Michael Kenneth Williams and Erykah Badu co-star. Steven Caple Jr. wrote and directed this crime drama, which made its world premiere at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Kathryn Bigelow's multiple-Oscar-winning film is a compelling fact-based, Iraq-set bomb disposal drama, scripted by journalist Mark Boal, drawing on his experiences while embedded with a United States Army Explosive Ordnance Disposal team in 2004. The focus is on the complex characters making up Bravo Company, who disable and destroy improvised explosive devices. The days are ticking down to the end of the bomb squad's tour, but their role puts the team in harm's way around the clock. And it doesn't help that one of the team is addicted to risk taking and pays scant attention to standard procedure, putting other lives in danger, as well as his own. The Hurt Locker provides a tense glimpse into the lives of these extraordinary men, and also probes the various psychologies of people whose job could kill them at any moment, as well as - briefly - exploring how they cope once away from their adrenaline-soaked vocation. Also starring Anthony Mackie, Ralph Fiennes, Guy Pearce, Brian Geraghty and Evangeline Lilly(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a Wyoming mountain cabin, where they find a group of other distrustful strangers. In time, tensions boil over and bloodshed ensues in this nerve-shredding Western thriller(n)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: A lonely animal-shelter employee kidnaps a woman he's developed a crush on, and keeps her locked in a cage at his work. However, she is guarding secrets of her own that help her turn the tables on her captor in this twisty, shocking horror flick(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
programme.desc: The intrepid junior agents have a showdown in another dimension with evil genius The Toymaker(n)

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A lonely autistic woman (Louisa Krause) begins a relationship with a charming chef (Gabriel Ebert), despite the misgivings of her caring but protective sister (Eliza Dushku). William Sullivan directed this romantic comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles
programme.desc: The Australian croc hunter and his reporter girlfriend investigate an international scandal involving stolen art and a crooked film studio in Hollywood in this action comedy sequel(n)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Focusing on the human interest story of a family man under terrifying pressures, the factually based action also vividly brings home the David and Goliath story of a battle that made US legal history(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: An Alcohol, Firearms and Tobacco agent tries to prevent a terrorist attack through the use of a secret government time-shifting experiment(n)

programme.title: Jimi: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin steps into the role of Jimi Hendrix in this biopic set during 1966-67, as the iconic rocker rose from playing backup guitar at New York's Cheetah Club to igniting the Monterey Pop Festival with a scorching performance that would go down as one of the most memorable in rock-and-roll history. Imogen Poots and Hayley Atwell co-star in a film written and directed by Oscar-winning 12 Years a Slave screenwriter John Ridley(n)

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Romantic comedy drama from the writer of Notting Hill and Four Weddings and a Funeral, which weaves in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor prime minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law flirts with a colleague, a writer heads off to Portugal and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his stepfather for advice on matters of the heart. Director: Richard Curtis (Conclusion of tonight's film)(n)

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: The fate of the last remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi is told from the differing points of view of a pro-life crusader, the director of a reproductive clinic, and a financially strapped single mother considering an abortion(n)

After making roughly 600,000 dollars on his clandestine endeavor and compromising everything from the identities of KGB spies working for the American government to nuclear war contingency plans, Hanssen was eventually transferred to a newly created position at the FBI's Washington headquarters and assigned the task of guarding his country's most sensitive secrets. It was while working in this capacity that a young agent named Eric O'Neill (Phillipe) was assigned the task of keeping tabs on Hanssen by suspicious higher-ups. Later, after being arrested while delivering a cache of secret documents to a "dead drop" spot in a Virginia park, the notorious traitor was arrested and sentenced to life in prison with no chance for parole(n)

programme.title: The Land
programme.desc: Four teens living in inner-city Cleveland (Jorge Lendeborg Jr., Moisés Arias, Rafi Gavron, and Ezri Walker) steal cars to support their dream of becoming pro skateboarders, and discover a large stash of pills during one heist. When they decide to sell the drugs themselves, they are targeted by an organic-food proprietor who's secretly a local crime boss (Linda Emond). Michael Kenneth Williams and Erykah Badu co-star. Steven Caple Jr. wrote and directed this crime drama, which made its world premiere at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Kathryn Bigelow's multiple-Oscar-winning film is a compelling fact-based, Iraq-set bomb disposal drama, scripted by journalist Mark Boal, drawing on his experiences while embedded with a United States Army Explosive Ordnance Disposal team in 2004. The focus is on the complex characters making up Bravo Company, who disable and destroy improvised explosive devices. The days are ticking down to the end of the bomb squad's tour, but their role puts the team in harm's way around the clock. And it doesn't help that one of the team is addicted to risk taking and pays scant attention to standard procedure, putting other lives in danger, as well as his own. The Hurt Locker provides a tense glimpse into the lives of these extraordinary men, and also probes the various psychologies of people whose job could kill them at any moment, as well as - briefly - exploring how they cope once away from their adrenaline-soaked vocation. Also starring Anthony Mackie, Ralph Fiennes, Guy Pearce, Brian Geraghty and Evangeline Lilly(n)

programme.title: The Circus: Inside the Biggest Story on Earth
programme.desc: Learning Curve. As Congress reconvenes, Mark McKinnon and John Heilemann head to Capitol Hill to find out what President Trump has learned in his first 100 days in office. Also, Mark Halperin goes to New York City to get Wall Street's perspective(n)

programme.desc: The dangerous patients at a maximum-security mental hospital break free from their rooms during a power failure, and embark on a grisly murder rampage that's destined to be remembered as one of the worst ever committed. Fifteen years ago, an elusive serial killer known as The Wolf claimed the lives of 15 young girls. Thanks to the work of Detectives Elliott Carbon (John Rhys-Davies) and Johnny Morgan ( Andrew Cymek), The Wolf was eventually captured, locked up, and placed in the care of Dr. Parker (William B. Davis). When the facility loses power and the lights go dark, however, The Wolf and the rest of the inmates seize the opportunity to reclaim their freedom. Now trapped in these winding corridors with a rampaging gang of maniacs, madmen, and murderers, Johnny and Dr. Parker must fight to survive the night, and ensure that no one escapes before order is restored(n)

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Creatures of the night find new prey on the scariest night of the year in this horror story. It's Halloween night, and four friends -- Allison (Vanessa Horneff), Elliott (Wil Horneff), Trevor (Karl Jacob), and Brian (Sean Reid) -- are on a road trip en route to a friend's wedding when their car breaks down after running into something. Looking for help, the four happen upon the farmhouse of an elderly couple, Elvin (Richard Little) and May (Barbara Wilhide), which is located next to a huge barn. Elvin and May have already become lost in the darkness of the barn, and soon two of the lost travelers are suffering the same fate as they search for friendly strangers. However, while they can barely see a hand in front of their face, they discover they're not alone in the barn, which has become home to a huge swarm of bloodthirsty bats. The Roost is framed by an introduction and postscript from a television horror show host, played by Tom Noonan(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Kyle Patrick Alvarez's drama The Stanford Prison Experiment is based on real events. Dr. Philip Zimbardo (Billy Cruddup) arranges for 24 volunteers to be either guards or inmates a makeshift prison system so that he can observe how their behavior changes. Eventually those playing guards become abusive and dictatorial, while the inmates band together to survive the harsh conditions. What the Stanford professor doesn't expect is that he and the people running the experiment are also being transformed by taking part in it. The Stanford Prison Experiment screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: River's Edge
programme.desc: There is no one in this dark drama about depraved young kids that is especially sympathetic which means that some audiences might find this a difficult 99 minutes -- though the presence of future star Keanu Reeves along with a turn by Dennis Hopper may create interest. Right at the beginning, 12-year-old Tim (Joshua Miller) heads to the riverbank where he discovers Samson (David Roebuck) alongside the nude body of his girlfriend whom he has just strangled to death. Tim not only decides it is best never to rat on a friend, but he goes one step further and pilfers some beers to bring to Samson. Supposedly based on a true 1981 case, all of Samson's buddies -- including the friends of the murder victim -- keep to a conspiracy of silence to protect the killer. They do this either from indifference or because they apparently see nothing wrong with murder. Layne (Crispin Glover) gets ex-biker and killer Feck (Hopper) to hide Samson while the murder is being investigated. Meanwhile Tim's older brother Matt (Reeves) begins to think that secretly informing the police may not be such a bad idea, as long as no one knows he did it(n)

When they decide to sell the drugs themselves, they are targeted by an organic-food proprietor who's secretly a local crime boss (Linda Emond). Michael Kenneth Williams and Erykah Badu co-star. programme.desc: When a high-profile hip-hop star is denied membership into an exclusive country club in the Hamptons, he comes up with a cunning plan to subvert the questionable ruling in this comedy of manners starring OutKast's Antwan Andre Patton. By purchasing property directly adjacent to the 18th hole, popular rapper C-Note (Patton) is subsequently granted membership into the haughty club by default. Andy Milonakis, Jeffrey Jones, and Faizon Love co-star(n)

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Shattered Glass director Billy Ray directs Chris Cooper and Ryan Philippe in this fact-based drama concerning the FBI traitor who carried out what many historians refer to as the most notable national security breach in U.S. history. A key member of the FBI's elite Soviet Analytical Unit, Robert Hanssen (Chris Cooper) would, for 15 years beginning in 1985, sell thousands of pages of classified documents to the Soviets. After making roughly 600,000 dollars on his clandestine endeavor and compromising everything from the identities of KGB spies working for the American government to nuclear war contingency plans, Hanssen was eventually transferred to a newly created position at the FBI's Washington headquarters and assigned the task of guarding his country's most sensitive secrets. It was while working in this capacity that a young agent named Eric O'Neill (Phillipe) was assigned the task of keeping tabs on Hanssen by suspicious higher-ups. Later, after being arrested while delivering a cache of secret documents to a "dead drop" spot in a Virginia park, the notorious traitor was arrested and sentenced to life in prison with no chance for parole(n)

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: Colonel Matrix (Arnold Schwarzenegger) is retired and living peaceably with his 10-year-old daughter (Alyssa Milano) when she is kidnapped by the henchmen of an exiled Latin American dictator. The dictator's plan is to reinstate himself in power by eliminating the president of his country, using Matrix to kill him (or he will kill the kidnapped daughter). Matrix escapes from the plane that is supposed to be carrying him to his mission and then proceeds to go from one violent confrontation to the next as he hunts down the dictator and moves to rescue his daughter. Helping him is Cindy (Rae Dawn Chong), who has her own reasons for wanting the dictator dead(n)

programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in co-existence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teenagers must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Psychological horror. Elizabeth Olsen stars as a woman who goes to help her father and uncle renovate an old house. But they soon find themselves locked in, fighting for survival(n)

programme.title: Aloft
programme.desc: In this mystical and nonlinear drama, a mother (Jennifer Connelly) reunites with her estranged son (Cillian Murphy), whom she abandoned two decades earlier after a strange encounter with a faith healer(n)

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A young cop is assigned to the precinct in Queens where he grew up, and he finds his life threatened when he investigates a police cover-up involving the unsolved murders of two boys(n)

programme.title: Step Up 2: The Streets
programme.desc: Director: Jon M. Chu. Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts(n)

programme.title: Misconduct
programme.desc: In this twisty thriller, a lawyer attempts to bring an unethical pharmaceutical executive to justice for manipulating drug trials, but his case is soon undermined when he is targeted by a blackmail scheme involving an extramarital affair(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: Oscar-winning sci-fi adventure. When a nuclear submarine crashes on the edge of a deep ocean trench following contact with an unidentified object, a team of oil riggers are seconded to aid a group of Navy SEALs on a rescue mission. But there is something else down there - something that is not quite human. The film won an Oscar for its cutting-edge visual effects(n)

programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in co-existence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teenagers must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace(n)

programme.title: Untraceable
programme.desc: Academy Award-nominee Diane Lane stars in this chilling thriller as an FBI agent trying to hunt down a serial killer who uses a website to document his murders. In a sadistic twist, his victims are killed at a faster rate when the site receives more hits, thus making everyone who views the site accomplices to the murder. As the phenomenon of the internet killings spirals out of control, the investigators' work on a timeline rushed by the dark nature of human curiosity and search for a killer who, having effectively covered his tracks, appears to be...untraceable!(n)

programme.title: Step Up 2: The Streets
programme.desc: Director: Jon M. Chu. Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts(n)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank Martin is back as the Transporter, who'll take anything anywhere, no questions asked, for the right money. This time, he's earning what should be easy money guarding the son of government drugs czar Billings. But when the boy is kidnapped by drugs lord Gianni, Martin takes it as a professional slur and sets out to find the boy and the baddies in Louis Leterrier's all-action film co-written by Luc Besson(n)

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: Enemies of Rome. Find out how the man becomes a legend in this must-see closing chapter. Spartacus prepares his army of rebel slaves for war. Sex/violence/strong language. (1/10)(n)

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: Wolves at the Gate. Spartacus leads a daring assault to provide food and shelter for his people, and Crassus receives an unexpected visitor. Sex/violence/strong language. (2/10)(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: The Bone Orchard. Mythological gods muster forces to prepare for war with modern-day deities. In the Series Premiere, Shadow Moon gets early release from prison and meets Mr. Wednesday, who recruites him to be his bodyguard(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: After losing his partner in an out of control bust, forensic psychologist Dr. Alex Cross (Morgan Freeman) stops working and cannot forgive himself. But he¿s drawn back to work when a brilliant but remorseless psychopath who has landed a teaching position at an exclusive private school in Washington, D.C. abducts one of his students, the daughter of a senator. Ollie MacArthur, the detective investigating the case, has strong words for Jezzie Flannigan, the Secret Service agent who mistakenly let Megan slip through her fingers. But Dr. Cross seeks out Flannigan, who he believes might have a valuable insight into the case. Soon, they both come to the terrible realization that this crime only represents the tip of the iceberg for the ruthless criminal(n)

programme.title: Surfer, Dude
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey rates a perfect 10 as a legendary hang-tenner who lives for chasing waves. When he returns to Malibu to find the ocean flat as a puddle and his endorsements drying up he gets pressured to become a corporate sell-out by a financial whiz who now owns his contract and promises him that he'll be returned to his "throne of cool." Willie Nelson, Woody Harrelson. Directed by S.R. Binder, who co-wrote the script with Cory Van Dyke, Mark Gustawes and George Mays(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: At their estranged father's funeral, three twentysomething siblings learn that they have a teenage half sister, and invite her to live with them. In time, her presence forces them to reflect on their own lives and family ties in this heartwarming drama(n)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: A man takes his dead twin brother's place as a CIA operative in order to trap a gang of nuclear arms terrorists. But the ruthless criminals learn of the deception and kidnap his fiancee. : Joel Schumacher(n)

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: Witty drama about a free-spirited baseball devotee, Annie Savoy, who chooses one promising player from her local minor-league team each year for intimate personal coaching. She has a hard time picking her man when the Durham Bulls' new season brings forth a brilliant but undisciplined rookie and a mature but fading veteran of the game(n)

programme.title: Kung Fu Hustle
programme.desc: Action flick set in 1940s China, about a wannabe gangster who tries to extort a town in order to impress an outlaw gang(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Gripping conspiracy thriller. After an assassination attempt on the American President (William Hurt) during a meeting of world leaders in Salamanca, a secret service agent attempts to piece together who was responsible. The event is replayed through the eyes of six different witnesses, each time from their individual perspective. Each time a little more is revealed about what really happened, with a new twist just when you think you have it all figured out(n)

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: Three teenagers plan to burglarise the home of a wealthy blind man, but their heist quickly goes awry as they end up fighting for their lives(n)

programme.desc: Witty drama about a free-spirited baseball devotee, Annie Savoy, who chooses one promising player from her local minor-league team each year for intimate personal coaching.
